issue.title: Exposition-only classes proxy and postfix-proxy for common_iterator should be fully constexpr

discussion.p: LWG added constexpr to all member functions and friends of common_iterator to make it fully constexpr, but accidentally omitted the exposition-only classes proxy and postfix-proxy defined for some member functions. We should make these two classes fully constexpr, too.
Set status to Tentatively Ready after seven votes in favour during reflector poll.
